fields.description: The requirement is to expose applicationDidReceiveMemoryWarning to the JS side of the application, possibly as an event, so that custom memory management could be put in place (like manually removing any UI elements etc.).
fields.summary: iOS: Expose applicationDidReceiveMemoryWarning to JavaScript side
